value.title: Introduction to Docker containers
value.excerpt: Introduction to Docker containers

value.title: Introduction to machine learning
value.excerpt: A high-level overview of machine learning for people with little or no knowledge of computer science and statistics. You’ll be introduced to some essential concepts, explore data, and interactively go through the machine learning life-cycle - using Python to train, save, and use a machine learning model like we would in the real world.

value.title: Fundamentals of network security
value.excerpt: Explore the fundamentals of computer networking security and monitoring.

value.title: Prepare your development environment for Azure development
value.excerpt: Learn how to choose and install the appropriate IDE for your requirements to help you build, deploy, monitor, and scale cloud-hosted solutions.

value.title: Top 5 security items to consider before pushing to production
value.excerpt: Learn about the Site Reliability Engineering approach to the challenge of assuring reliability and gain a better understanding of why it matters.

value.title: Translate text and speech
value.excerpt: Automated translation capabilities in an AI solution enables closer collaboration by removing language barriers.

value.title: An introduction to decentralized identities | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Danny Strockis joins Scott Hanselman to discuss decentralized identity, which gives users ownership of their digital identities and data by leveraging permissionless distributed ledgers.  04:07 - Authentication concept 10:30 - Demo  Decentralized identity – Own your own identity https://aka.ms/azfr/566/01
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/r28GeXkxn0w" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Azure Certifications for developers | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn about the Azure Certifications for developers.    For more tips and tricks, visit: https://aka.ms/azuretipsandtricks     Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your free account today with Microsoft Azure: https://azure.com/free
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/aTBFvrLKu3U" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Enabling secure remote work using Windows Virtual Desktop | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Windows Virtual Desktop (WVD) is a comprehensive desktop and app virtualization service running in Azure to enable secure remote work. Christiaan Brinkhoff joins Scott Hanselman to show how WVD is different from other desktop virtualization technologies, as well as how easy it is to implement and maintain.
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/dL1LpGpGRIo" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Full-stack end-to-end monitoring with Azure Monitor | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Rahul Bagaria joins Lara Rubbelke to discuss Azure Monitor, which now includes Log Analytics and Application Insights. Azure Monitor provides full stack monitoring tools for collecting and analyzing telemetry that allow you to maximize the performance and availability of your cloud and on-premises resources
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/B5X7M0WlOtY" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: How to connect and deliver services privately on Azure with Azure Private Link | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Narayan Anamalai joins Donovan Brown to introduce Azure Private Link. In this episode, Narayan demonstrates how you can secure Azure PaaS resources and your Azure network using Private Link, and provide protection against data exfiltration.  8:45 - Demo  Azure Private Link overview https://aka.ms/azfr/610/01

value.title: How to export your resources to CSV using the Azure Portal | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: The Azure Portal allows you to customize the information you'd like to export. In this video of the Azure Portal "How To" Series, learn how to easily export your files to CSV.   Try out these features in the Azure portal: https://portal.azure.com     Keep connected on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AzurePortal

value.title: How to troubleshoot the most common issues on Azure resources | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: In this video of the Azure Portal “How To” Series, you will learn how to troubleshoot the most common issues on Azure resources using the new Diagnose and Solve Problems feature.   Try out these features in the Azure portal: https://portal.azure.com     Keep connected on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AzurePortal

value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn how to use secure configuration for Azure Functions with Azure Key Vault. value.title: Allow users to reset their password with Azure Active Directory self-service password reset
value.excerpt: Learn how to allow users to reset their password with Azure Active Directory self-service password reset.

value.title: Analyze images with the Computer Vision service
value.excerpt: The Computer Vision service enables software engineers to create intelligent solutions that extract information from images; a common task in many artificial intelligence (AI) scenarios.

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Operational excellence
value.excerpt: Learn how to design an Azure architecture that uses modern practices and gives you full visibility into what's happening in your environment.

value.title: Build and run a web application with the MEAN stack on an Azure Linux virtual machine
value.excerpt: Learn how to decide if the MEAN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, AngularJS, and Node.js) is a good choice for you and set up a MEAN-based web application on a new Azure Linux virtual machine.

value.title: Classify images with the Custom Vision service
value.excerpt: Image classification is a common workload in artificial intelligence (AI) applications. It harnesses the predictive power of machine learning to enable AI systems to identify real-world items based on images.

value.title: Understand virtualization
value.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Take a deep dive into virtualization by understanding its formal definition as well as the different types of virtual machines.

value.title: Connect an app to Azure Storage
value.excerpt: Create a simple application and add configuration, client library references, and C# or JavaScript code to connect it to Azure Storage.

value.title: Detect and analyze faces with the Face service
value.excerpt: Face detection, analysis, and recognition is an important capability for artificial intelligence (AI) solutions. The Face cognitive service in Azure makes it easy integrate these capabilities into your applications.
